ai-pli-tv-pvr2.14:1.1_0: consent to physical contact with the four kinds of legal issues: legal issues arising from the gods of the Thirty? What is a legal issue?
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.14:1.2_0: consent to physical contact with the body, there is a legal issue arising from an offense that is a condition for legal issues. ...
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.14:2.1_0: curd that he himself has asked for, and what is an offense?
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.14:2.2_0: curd that they had asked for, there is a legal issue arising from an offense:
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.14:3.1_0: The sixth section for recitation on legal issues is finished.
